SEARCH
Package Users

Class Staff

java.lang.Object
Users.User
Users.Staff
Direct Known Subclasses:
Administrator, Doctor, Pharmacist
public class Staff extends User
The Staff class is a subclass of User that represents staff members in a hospital system. It includes additional attributes such as name, gender, and age, and provides methods to access and modify these attributes. Staff details can also be converted to a CSV-formatted string.
Since:
2024-11-21

  • Constructor Details

    • Staff

      public Staff(String HospitalID, String password)
      Constructs a new Staff instance with the specified hospital ID and password.
      Parameters:
      HospitalID - the unique hospital ID of the staff member.
      password - the password associated with the staff member's account.

    • toCSV

      protected String toCSV()
      Converts the staff member's details to a CSV-formatted string.
      Returns:
      a CSV representation of the staff member's details in the format: HospitalID;Password;Name;Staff;Gender;Age.
